about_the_game:
In the vast expanse of space, a lone robot awakens on a floating platform, its origins shrouded in mystery. The remnants of a once-great human empire litter the cosmos, and it's up to you to uncover the truth behind humanity's demise.

As a lone robot adrift in space, you must scavenge from space debris, gather resources, and upgrade your floating platform to enhance your chances of survival. But survival is not your only concern - discovering new body parts scattered throughout the cosmos adds an intriguing layer of depth to the gameplay. These body parts serve as both tools and upgrades, allowing you to customize your robot and tailor your abilities to suit your robotic needs.

Features


Customization: Customize your robot with a vast array of body parts, each offering unique abilities and enhancements. From powerful devices to advanced sensors, the possibilities are endless.


Exploration: Embark on an expansive journey through the remnants of human civilization, exploring distant bases, derelict spacecraft, and mysterious anomalies scattered throughout the cosmos. Uncover hidden secrets, discover new technologies, and piece together the history of humanity's downfall.


Survival: Navigate space as you scavenge for resources and use them to expand your base to enhance your chances of survival.


Co-op Multiplayer: Team up with friends in co-op multiplayer and embark on an epic adventure together. Work together to explore distant bases, find new technologies and build your own floating base.
